授業目的: The primary purpose of the course is to help students understand what engaging presentations are and give students opportunities to hands-on practices of making and giving effective presentations. You will learned and apply the presentation zen techniques on how to plan and deliver good presentations. The course also provide a plenty of opportunities to discuss diverse topics with your classmates.
到達目標:
1. You are able to feel more confident and comfortable when presenting ideas in English.
2. You are able to understand and apply effective approaches for planning, making, and giving presentations.
3. You are able to develop your discussion skills.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
